result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kyle Michael Casagranda

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Kyle Michael Casagranda
Current: P.O. Box 96, Caspian, MI 49915 United States  (Effective: 09-06-2022)
Prior: 525 Meadowbrook Ln, Marquette, MI 49855

1:48 PM Defendant Kyle Michael Casagranda in court.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Kyle Michael Casagranda.  Attorney Kathryn Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Schraven provides plea form.
ADA heard on agreement.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1.
Deft enters a plea of guilty.
Non-citizen advisory.
No firearms.
May not vote or serve on jury until civil rights are restored.
PleaQuest/WOR.
Constitutional rights.
Read-ins.
Deft understands.
Elements of offense.
Atty Schraven satisfied.
Factual basis.
Court finds Deft enters plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; therefore court accepts plea and finds Deft guilty to Count 1.
Court dismisses and reads-in Counts 2, 3, and 4.
Court orders presentence investigation be completed.  Agent to provide report to court at least 2 weeks prior to sentencing. 
2:00 off record.
2:01 back on record.
Court schedules with parties.
Court orders deft to cooperate with the PSI process.
Court orders deft to go to the DOC office today, to schedule the PSI.
2:03 PM
Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

3:27 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kyle Michael Casagranda appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Kyle Michael Casagranda. 
Prelim quest/WOR provided
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
Court moves to ARGN
DA has no objection and confirms information will track complaint
Waives reading
Pleads n/g
Requests STC 
3:31PM
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 01:50 pm.

8:51 AM Defendant Kyle Michael Casagranda appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Kyle Michael Casagranda. 
Court calls case.
Atty Schraven heard - has reviewed complaint with deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal readings.
Requests prelim within time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
8:52 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
8:37 AM Defendant Kyle Michael Casagranda appeared by video, in custody at Marquette County.  Attorney Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft heard - has not tried to contact the PD's office yet.
Claims he can not make a phone call without paying for it.
Atty Hansen is present and is heard - if the Deft calls their office today, they will evaluate him.
Court orders deft to contact the Peshtigo PD office today.
ADA heard.
Court heard - state to writ the deft here for the next hearing.
8:40 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.

11:30 AM Defendant Kyle Michael Casagranda in court, in custody at Marquette County Jail.  Robert J Mraz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court calls case.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Deft heard - has reviewed and understands charges an penalties.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $2,500 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx.
Deft to contact the Public Defenders office today.
Court schedules with parties.
If deft is still in custoday in Marquette, may appear by video.
11:33 AM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
